# CasaColinaCare.com

> CasaColinaCare.com is a website for a care home facility in Hawaii.

Important notes:

- The postal address of the facility is 189 Anapalua Street, Honolulu, HI
- It is own and operated by Casa Colina Care LLC
- Established in 2026

## Docs

- [AGENTS.md](AGENTS.md): Repository instructions for coding agent
- [CLAUDE.md](CLAUDE.md): AI assistant guidance with dev commands, architecture, and code standards
- [A Contextual Prompt for Agent](ai_docs/A_Contextual_Prompt_for_Agent.md): Contextual prompt guidance for AI agents
- [AI Collaborative Architecture](ai_docs/AI_Collaborative_Architecture_The_Definitive_Project_Template_for_Next.js_15.md): Definitive project template for Next.js 15
- [Branching & Merging Strategy](ai_docs/branching-merging-strategy.md): Git branching and merging strategy
- [General AI Behaviour](ai_docs/general_ai_behaviour.md): General AI behaviour guidelines
- [Next.js Project Standards](ai_docs/next.js-project-standards-best-practices.md): Next.js project standards and best practices
- [Test-Driven Development TypeScript](ai_docs/test-driven-development-typescript.md): TDD practices for TypeScript
- [Universal Coding Principles](ai_docs/univeral_coding_principle.md): Universal coding principles
- [Website PRD](prd/002_init_design/prd-casacolinacare-website.md): Product requirements for the Casa Colina Care website
- [Website SPEC](prd/002_init_design/SPEC.md): Engineering specification for the website
